LanguageData.RimMisc_DefaultDoUntil: Use "Do Until X" as default setting for bills
LanguageData.RimMisc_AutoCloseLetters: Automatically close letters after a set time
LanguageData.RimMisc_AutoCloseLettersSeconds: How many seconds before a letter is closed: {0}
LanguageData.RimMisc_PatchBuildingHp: Give all production buildings huge HP
LanguageData.RimMisc_ConstructEvenIfNotEnough: Haul resources to blueprints even if there are not enough resources
LanguageData.RimMisc_ChangeAreaOnThreat: Switch to "area#safe" on threat and back to "area" when no threat
LanguageData.RimMisc_MyMiscStuff: Miscellaneous changes that I personally enjoy
LanguageData.RimMisc_EnableRocketmanTimeDilation: Enable Rocketman time dilation for all safe races
LanguageData.RimMisc_DesignatorMeleeAttackDesc: Designate this building to be melee attacked.
LanguageData.RimMisc_GeneMutationTime: {0} days until gene mutation finishes. Detected {1}/{2} owned/total genes.
LanguageData.RimMisc_ThreatToggleDesc: Automatically enables this only if there is a threat
LanguageData.ToggleSafeArea: Colonist {0} changed to safe allowed area "{1}" at {2}
LanguageData.ToggleUnsafeArea: Colonist {0} changed to unsafe allowed area "{1}" at {2}
LanguageData.ImplantXenogermAllDesc: Instantly implants this xenogerm to all colonists, if possible.
